name: Pink Onion
author: Chanel M.
description: Hubby and I came here for dinner last Saturday night... and boy was it good! I'm a huge pizza fan and love trying new spots when they open. We got the meatballs and goat cheese bruschetta to start, both were excellent. We shared the Mike Tyson punchout pizza lol, delish. Passed my pizza test! Will definitely be back.
